alert.note: Alert for Butte; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foothills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 03 at 12:56PM MST until December 03 at 4:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. For the High Wind Watch, northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Butte County, the Rapid City area, the Pennington County Plains, the Sturgis/Piedmont Foot Hills and the Southern Meade County Plains. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 4 PM MST this afternoon. For the High Wind Watch, from Monday morning through Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...The high winds could blow down large trees and damage roofs, small outbuildings, and signs. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Butte; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foothills
